admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Government will make the proceeds of
            the Credit available to BRI at 3% interest per annum with
            the repayment schedule of the credit component based on the
            repayment schedules of subloans, ranging between 5 and 15
            years, and the technical assistance component to be repaid
            in 20 years, including a grace period of 4 years. The
            project will: (a) finance long-term loans for about 40,000
            smallholders for subprojects primarily in fisheries,
            livestock and perennial crops; and (b) improve BRI's
            term lending capability through technical assistance in
            program development, training, credit procedures, accounting
            and management information, and through financing of a study
            of the project's socio-economic impact.
